WRITING.TITLE: Felt something new again!
WRITING.TEXT:
While im meditating first i got the basic feelings of calmness and lightness. Also for some time i felt really cold. Then i started to feel pressure on my forehead (about where the forhead starts and right in the middle, kinda between my eyebrows), it was like some one would push my forehead with a finger, but little bit different. Its interesting that i have gotten the exact same feeling ones in a while. I just realized that! Like three times a year, some times more. I have no idea what isit.
I remember the first time when i was yonger maybe 12(now im 19). I was sitting on a floor and i felt the same feeling and out of no where i got an idea to close my eyes and closely bring my finger closer to my forehead and i felt the pressure rising. I did it few times and every time when the finger were closer the pressure started rising. I dont feel it always, i notice it sometimes when i just start to feel the pressure on that certain point. Also i remember this because i think meditation has made me remember stuff easier. I love that i found meditation.
Dude wow!

WRITING.TITLE: NEVER FELT ANYTHING LIKE THIS
WRITING.TEXT:
Im new to meditation and this was my third time meditating and i meditated for 1,30h. It was easy and amazing. The first time i meditated i didnt felt anything unusual and i meditated for 10min. Second time i meditated for 30min and it was relaxing. But today i meditated for 1,30h and i felt so many different energies and sensations.
(I lit up two candles in front of me and put meditation music playing from my phone) i sat on the floor legs crossed and my back was against my bed and closet. So first feeling was like i was getting super tiny and the room was moving. Then i felt something going through me and i felt like i was in some kind of void. My whole bodey felt numb. The last was, i felt like i got some kind of invicible bubble around me.
now im laying in my bed and i still sense it. I feel like im already changed person and i have meditated three times. I dont know if this affects it but im super open minded and i dont judge enything if i havent tried it first. Aslo with people i dont judge anyone because everyone has their own story and reasons why the act how they act.
Meditation is just simply the best thing for me to relax.
Id like to know too :S
Im more emotional than before. I mean my emotions are much more strong than usual. And i also turn red pretty easily.
I started to meditate

A short story of my dad so my dad has many diseases( he has gone through many surgeries example kidney, heart and differen kind of vein surgeries) and he has loads of meds and example one time he needed tramadols for his nerve pains and the pain stopped and he was left with many pacs of tramadols so i took some of the tramadols( i would never take something that he needs everyday and could die without and propably would kill me ) not full pacs just few sheets yes they are a bit addictive but has antidepressiant effects and when im under the effects im super outgoing and talkstive and my anxiety goes away completely, i feel so euphoric and im super morivated even the most boring things are interesting and i get so much shit done. But i need to be careful with drugs because some drugs cause liver damage in the long run and i have diabetes(type 1 so cant do anything to make it go away) so my liver is already under pressure. But to the point i know there are anti-addictive drugs and some no prescription nootropics that are mood boosting.

I suggest meditation! It has helped me a lot. It was so hard to be still with my own thoughts even for 10 minutes. But i promise when you learn it a bit it will be so helpful. When you are trying to make friends the best thing to do is to be yourself. You dont want to try being some one else because thats not gonna end well for you. Just be yourself. Push your limits. I know its fucking hard and stuff but you have to do something to improve. Otherwise nothing will happen. Have you contacted a doctor? If not you should do it because you could get some medicatoin and it can help you to be more social. Im normally super itrovert but in my meds im the same me but much more outgoing. I hope youll get better and i hope my message helps! You can come and talk to me if you want more detailed advices or if you just want to ask questions! You dont need to you can check stuff online but i have personal experience and im diagnosed by a doctor and i have depression and social anxiety. I just want to be as helpful as i can!
Take care bro!

Is your dog okay now? And i got this energy feeling in my toes and fingertips and i felt like i was floating and in the end i felt pressure in my head. Im new to meditation too. And i set up the alarm but didnt turn it on so i meditated for 30min :D. But it was super relaxing

I do the same. I have collected videos from youtube, pins from pinterest and Books from some palces but never used them really. Except now im sickof my bullshit and im starting to meditate everyday and do the things i told my self. Actually i just mesitatet for 30mins and i hve never meditatet over 10mins. I just forgot to put an alarm :D . It was nice tho i felt almost like floating and my mind was empty there were nothing. I did not expect that.
I have anxiety and sometimes i turn red in social situations. Also sometimes when i drink i turn red for some minutes(even when im comfortable).
Definitely going to read that! It sounds awesome
Thanks for writing your experience! Id love to try this because i have anxiety and depression but i dont know the root cause why i have them.. Im going to try this today before going to bed.
Definitely going to watch this later!

Im new to meditation(only meditatet few times) and id love to get same kind of experience that you had. I know the basics and i have a small book whitch is for beginners its really short i read it in 15minutes, it has loads of pictures and short sentences like thoughts can become obsessive and intrustive; they can also become stuck and repetitive. Its a really cool book called Quiet the mind
Alright, thank you!
I Read books, play games, research stuff, exercise and programming
Yes dont get into skipping because its fucking hard to get out of.. im in this skipping habit and its mostly because im depressed and it takes all of my enegry to do even the smallest things

When im in anxous situation i turn red and my muscles get stiff. Its so stressful and i usually avoid social situations when i know that could happen... im sorry i dont know if its serious and im sad to hear that u get nauseous.. i hope you get better!
I dont really feel any good effect of nicotine.. sometimes i even feel like shit after smoking cigarette. And caffein, i dont notice anything.. is there anything that could boost the effect

Im good looking and ive never been deniend by a girl. But im still super fucking anxous because i was bullied in highschool and two of my friends died and my confidence got crushed. It was 5 years ago and now im socially anxous and i have depression

I can relate... i just want to go to some amazing house which is somewere amazing and be alone or with my gf and have drugs, computer, books etc and be there for the rest of my life.. i cant handle this life i have, I have problems going to school and i skip alot... i need to talk to my parenst more about my feelings..
Ok! And i watch psychedelicsubstanse or what ever it was but he has videos about ego death and i have watched them!
Good to hear! I just have to figure out my self where i would get some

WRITING.TITLE: Unexperienced drug use
WRITING.TEXT:
I have anxiety and depression. Sometimes I take tramadol 50mg just to feel motivated and euphoric. I have sleeping problems and thats why i usually skip school(thats why im stressed all the time). Now im watching youtube 1 am, feeling like shit and i just wanted to feel good so i took 2, 50mg tramadols and 10, 25mg atarax pills. I dont have much drug experience other than weed(id love to try LSD and shrooms someday or salvia whitch is smokable right?). Suddently i started to heard weird noice like high pitch and then it started to lower and now it sounds like im under water. Im feeling super relaxed tho! (And because im in these drugs they make me super extrovert and wanting to talk to people maybe because im normally introvert and socially anxious)
Any thoughts? What is the best antidepressant for you? What should i try, any suggestions?
And what about smoking? I smoke cigarettes and sometimes it makes me feel good and sometimes it makes me feel like shit, why?
Please dont
How did it go?

Its so weird to feel suddently good. Yes i sometimes take tramadol to feel euphoric but sometimes without that i get the feeling of happiness. I have no idea why. Maybe im getting better? I dont know.(im not suicidal tho, and i feel sad and broken reading your message. If i could use magic to make you feel better, i would.)

You are stronger than the most of the depressed people. I have problems leaving my home. Ive been skipping school and i take pills to feel even little bit of euphoric. You are working, so you have some strength in you and you have self discipline. Keep working untill you find your true calling. Doing something is better than doing nothing. Keep going!

So your boyfriend is not helping you? Then he is not worthy for you. You are amazing an unique no one can take that away from you. Everyone has their own beauty and its in the eyes of the viewer to be experienced. So if your boyfriend is not helping you ( i would definetly help you and listen you and give answers if i was there even that i dont know you but still) you should see a doctor. So you would stop harming yourself and maybe gain confidence and self love back. Please try to get better, you are worth it.

I have been skipping scool so much.. i have so much undone work. Im failing. So dont worry just dont make it a habit because it will become a habit if you skip too many times in a week.. you could skip like ones or twice a month. You can make some kind of long weekends example saturday sunday and monday free. It can help alot of you are under stress and hate mondays. DONT SKIP too often its so hard to stop skipping school if you got into the taste of it

Yeah first time i caught my girlfriend cheating on me was at night i was going through her phone and she was sending nudes to a guy she said not to worry about. The second time was few days ago and one time she was playing a game and she talked to him (through discord) for 13hours straight at my home and she was talking so dirty and perverted stuff and i was anxous about it and askd her what was going on and she said not to worry about and thet few days ago she forgot her discord open on my pc and yeah i found out that they were talking like they were together and i felt so numb. I gave her a third chance but i just dont know and cant get my head around it but how she could to this again and what the fuck was she thinking... She said she have no answers why she did that but i really cannot trust her so im fuckig lost. And i also have depression and failing school so im stressed all the time and that does not help my sitsuation.

We are depressed so we propably dont compliment ourselves enough. Even the smallest compliment feels amazing and its okay. Dont be sad or weirded about it. Accept all the compliments you get, you have earned them.

Yes you really cant know 100% surely if someday the love of your life is going to fuck you up. Because the love of my life i have depression and im still with her. She has cheated on me twice. Not sex but flirting, making other people to fell in love with her and sending nuded. She did this twice and she got me fucked but im so pathetic that i love her so much i just cant leave her.
Love is fucking hurtful thing and it can be the most amazing thing in your life and propably will be but it can also be fatal and put you to the path of suicide. Be careful and dont rush into things and move slowly in relationships. Get to know the person super well and then make your moves if you want. Just be careful and move slow.

WRITING.TITLE: I cant finnish anything [help please]
WRITING.TEXT: I have this bad habit that i almost never finish anything that ive started. Im depressed, socially anxious and lazy. I love sience and usually i skip school and research things and make a video out of it. I think the school im in is a waste of time and i have so much undone work and im at the last year and i have 60 points (should have 120 points now) and in the summer i should have 180 points to graduate. Im so unmotivated to do anything school related and my passion was programming for a while and thats why i chose the shcool im in but i have always liked sience and researching things what i usually do in my freetime. The things i have undone is mostly normal subjects like english, swedish(whitch i fucking hate), math, chemistry etc... its just that im so anxious that i get uncomfortable if i walk past someone. I just want to quit school and do the things i love but even with knowledge but without school graduate i cant get a job that i would enjoy. I FUCKING HATE NORMAL JOBS. I got so fucking depressed when i had a summer job that was about keeping some outside area clean. I literally everyday how long i would be there. Also i started smoking because i coudnt handle the stress that i had every day. I just want to quit everything and relax and learn to calm and relif all the stress i have. How could i handle my situation?

I started doing youtube recently i have just few videos but this helped me. If you are writin about a certain subject, research and learn about it untill you can teach it to someone who has none knowledge of it. And then write a full research document and then write a smaller document of it whitch includes the main things and some interesting facts. Now days average people dont want to read super long texts of anything, they get bored. So after writing the smaller document you can show it to your friend or your family member and ask if it was too long, too short or just right. Im not an expert but i think this is a good way. But if its for school or some other really important thing that needs every information you have from the subject you should post the whole research document of it.

I have the same thing that i turn red if my friend or someone talks to me in a public place and also yes people call me good looking my friends are saying that i could have anyone who i ever wanted. The blushing thigy limits so much what i want to do because i avoid some situations and example in a bus my anxiety kicks in super hard and even when im walking in street and even if one people walks past me i usualy check phone because of getting so anxious if im just walking. I dont know why.

Man i feel you.. Im 19 and i feel like failture peace of shit that doesnt deserve to live. I have depression and anxiety. Life is a fucking joke and i believe that nothing really matters but still i some how keep on going. I have a girlfriend that half a year ago cheated on me and i got depressed and i had no fucking way that i could have left her. She is the love of my life i love her more than anything. because of her Im crying at the moment and i have pain in my heart like real pain i feel like some one is poking it with needles. Im failing school im failing my life. I really dont know what to do because im scared of everything. im scared to go to the bus that i use to get to school. Im so done, i dont have answers to anything. So whats left.. Everything. I have this feeling in my brain that maybe i wasnt supposed to win. maybe i was made to fail to feel like peace of shit. So im fucking going to show everybody what i can do and reach my goals and finally fucking WIN. after that im gonna help people i want to help the people who are going through the same as we are. you dont want that feeling you are feeling to enyone else? right? then no one wants you to feel that way about yourself? i bet there are loads of amazing people to talk to. the most important thing is to SPEAK. even if its through your phone, it helps. Please dont give up on your life. you have so much to see to experience even bad things but that is part of being a human right? there cant be good if there is no bad. Think about it. Think for your self what you really want and start looking for ways to get closer to it no matter what. dont give up

Im 19. I feel like a fucking loser. im not confidence anymore i have anxiety i have depression i have trust issues to my girlfriend and im crying my eyes out i feel pain in my heart that i have never felt before. its 00:00 a clock and tomorrow is school. Last week i was only on monday at school. im failing my life im losing grip on my self. i dont want to live because im scared of everyting but also i dont want to die. im fucking lost.
